definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: Hamsters do not need to bath with water and soap like humans.
sentences.chinese: 仓鼠不需要像人那样用水和肥皂冲凉。

sentences.english: After I get up, I brush my teeth , and take a shower.
sentences.chinese: 早上起床后，我就会去刷牙和冲凉。

sentences.english: It's Thursday and I haven't showered.
Park it on the bathroom counter while you’re washing up.
sentences.chinese: 当你冲凉时把它放到浴室柜子上。

sentences.english: His morning ritual is to make coffee, take a shower and have breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 他早晨习惯就是泡咖啡，冲凉和吃早饭。

sentences.english: Here, inmates shower and receive prison uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，囚犯们冲凉后换上狱服。

sentences.english: Maybe Diana is in the showerand can’t hear it.
sentences.chinese: 也许斯黛安在冲凉没听到。

sentences.english: This report also stated that much of these effects were due to showering in chlorinated water.
sentences.chinese: 此份报告还指出，使用含氯水冲凉也会对人造成危害。

sentences.english: Listening to loud music or having a cold shower were named as other popular ways to get going after getting out of bed.
sentences.chinese: 放大音乐或冲凉也是受欢迎的消除起床气的方法。

sentences.english: We return to the train for showers and coffee like happy Bedouins.
sentences.chinese: 我们回到火车上冲凉，喝咖啡，像是快乐的游牧人。

sentences.english: Between the north wall and the inner chamber is a passage for movement to the bathroom facilities.
sentences.chinese: 北墙和里面房间之间有条冷巷，通向厕所和冲凉房。

sentences.english: Maybe Diana is in the shower and can’t hear it.
sentences.chinese: 也许戴安娜在冲凉没听到。

definition: to wash the face and rinse the mouth
to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
